name: OCPIEnergyMix
description: This type is used to specify the energy mix and environmental impact of the supplied energy at a location or in a tariff.

fields.name: is_green_energy
fields.description: True if the power is 100% from regenerative sources

fields.name: energy_sources
fields.description: Key-value pairs (enum + percentage) of energy sources of this location’s tariff.

fields.name: environ_impact
fields.description: Key-value pairs (enum + percentage) of nuclear waste and CO2 exhaust of this location’s tariff.

fields.name: supplier_name
fields.description: Name of the energy supplier, delivering the energy for this location or tariff.*

fields.name: energy_product_name
fields.description: Name of the energy suppliers product/tariff plan used at this location.*
